params._inputBox: The input box used by the portal

depositBatchERC1155Token(address,address.details: Please make sure `_tokenIds` and `_values` have the same length.

params._baseLayerData: Additional data to be interpreted by the base layer
params._execLayerData: Additional data to be interpreted by the execution layer
params._tokenIds: The identifiers of the tokens being transferred

depositBatchERC1155Token(address,address.notice: Transfer a batch of ERC-1155 tokens to an application and add an input to the application's input box to signal such operation. The caller must enable approval for the portal to manage all of their tokens beforehand, by calling the `setApprovalForAll` function in the token contract.

getInputBox().notice: Get the input box used by this input relay.

userdoc.notice: This contract allows anyone to perform batch transfers of ERC-1155 tokens to an application while informing the off-chain machine.
